name: Clutter RefleXIVe: The Diceman Cometh - Collector's Edition
name_original: Clutter RefleXIVe: The Diceman Cometh - Collector's Edition
description:
The most fun & challenging Clutter yet, with over 2800 puzzles to keep you playing for days and days. So many new Clutter variations mixed in with old favorites for a Quest you'll never forget.

This Collector's Edition has 15% more puzzles and additional bonus materials.
Bonus area includes the very popular Box Songs variation, Crazy Singletons & Circular Abstratica.

As always, the Clutter levels are highly addicting and replayable.
In addition, there are Sliders, Square Jigsaws & Box Quotes with a new Variation.
And wait until you see the Dice & Icon Puzzles.
You've never seen Clutter this fun & challenging.

And as always, the options let you play Clutter the way you want.
And Favorites allow you can collect the puzzles you want to play again and again.

  • New Object Sets & Many New Gameplay Modes
  • Over 2800 levels and a very challenging 100 level Main Quest
  • An extra hard Dice Quest and a No-Motion Old-School Quest
  • Hundreds of picture puzzles and 300 new Box Quotes puzzles
  • Randomly generated levels mean endless replayability
  • Another Great Soundtrack with a Cinematic Feel.
